tool_description: An APi showing all the latest Ukraine-Russia War News around the World (German Language included).
name: Ukraine War LIVE
title: Ukraine War LIVE

api_list.name: Get Individual News Source News
api_list.description: This endpoint returns News about Ukraine War from a specific news source.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ukraine-war-live3.p.rapidapi.com/news/guardian"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ukraine-war-live3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://ukraine-war-live3.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ukraine-war-live3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Ukraine War news
api_list.description: This endpoint will give all War news (Russia - Ukraine Conflict) from  articles all over the world.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ukraine-war-live3.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ukraine-war-live3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
